about_the_game:
Game Introduction:

Street Li Fang Zhuan is a Chinese micro horror game set in 1980s China, combining the story of understanding puzzles and text adventures. In the game, the scroll scene that can be moved by four axes is applied to bring different game experience to the player. The game also contains a lot of Chinese folk culture and intangible cultural content, so that players can understand the traditional Chinese culture in the game process. The story of Li Fang takes place in a small border town in the 1980s. Duan Li Fang, an ethnic Bai girl, is an ordinary textile worker at a Chuncheng textile factory. Her husband, Li Minglai, is an active soldier who is participating in the border defense war in southern Yunnan. One day, the husband came home from the army on leave to visit his family, and the young couple, who had not seen each other for a long time, made an appointment to go to the theater next door to watch a movie called Flowers under the Mountain. This is a long lost romantic date, but a series of bizarre events occurred along the way. Duan Li Fang, who misses her husband, could not imagine that this dreamy date would be the beginning of that bottomless nightmare...

Game Features:

· Rich puzzle elements

The game has designed many thought-provoking boutique puzzle sections, so that players can have an immersive puzzle experience

· A variety of small games

The game has designed a large number of interesting boutique games to bring players a lot of different game experience.

· thought-provoking stories

The story of the game is set in the 1980s, and the art style of the game shows the player a carefully dynamic and thought-provoking anti-war story.

· All kinds of Chinese elements

There are a lot of unique Chinese cultural elements in the game, which is a good medium for players who like or want to learn about traditional Chinese culture.

The developer states:

Hello everyone UU who love the street series, it is a pleasure to meet you with our new "Street Li Fang Biography", and the game is planned to be launched during the Spring Festival next year. As a derivative of the "Street" story, "Street Li Fang Biography" from the perspective of Duan Li Fang to complete the story, if you have not experienced the "Street" UU can also complete the experience to play "Street", of course, you can also directly experience the work is no problem. Hope this game can give you UU a complete, quality game experience ~ Thank you again for your street friends have been the support and love, we "street Fang" goodbye ~~
